hotels.title: Taiwan Mountaintop Escape with Taiwanese Restaurant
hotels.description: Stay among the mountains in Taiwan's Indigenous alpine township at Hotel Indigo Alishan, an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of the breathtaking Alishan National Scenic Area. The hotel enjoys jaw-dropping panoramas across Alishan's undulating landscape. When hunger strikes, make your way to the onsite restaurant, Ton'u, where international staples are served alongside mouthwatering Chiayi County snacks and traditional Taiwan cuisine (think beef noodles, gua bao and fried chicken).
